# MISSING HOVERBIKE SHIPMENT [color=#a4885c]Hull Configuration:[/color] Micro, Aft Docking
[color=#a4885c]Crew Slots:[/color] 1 Person
[color=#a4885c]Power System:[/color] 1x JRPACMAN Welding Fuel Generator
[color=#a4885c]Atmospherics:[/color] Air canisters
[color=#a4885c]Weapons:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Designation:[/color] Civilian
"This UCE Shippment of Hoverbikes was reported missing from an inventory manifest. It seems someone stowed away in it and converted it into a makeshift shuttle. Looks like one of the hoverbikes is still there."
